title: County Wide Training Burn in Friday Harbor
lede: San Juan Island Fire & Rescue will be conducting a training on March 19th and 20th.  Exercises are planned to occur between 8:30 a.m. and 4:30 p.m on both days.
body:
Exercises are planned to occur between 8:30 a.m. and 4:30 p.m on both days. The training will be at 765 Guard Street and will involve live fire operations.  The building will be eventually consumed and demolished.

\
Neighbors can expect to see smoke columns and possibly flames depending on location.  Guard Street, between Marguerite and Tucker will be closed to all but local residents.


The training will include members from Lopez, Orcas, and Shaw Island Fire Departments as well, and will help to ensure that our firefighters are well prepared to continue their work in protecting our islandsâ€™ communities.
